metadata.title: CVE-2020-12658 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** gssproxy (aka gss-proxy) before 0.8.3 does not unlock cond_mutex before pthread exit in gp_worker_main() in gp_workers.c. NOTE: An upstream comment states "We are already on a shutdown path when running the code in question, so a DoS there doesn't make any sense, and there has been no additional information provided us (as upstream) to indicate why this would be a problem."

criterions.comment: gssproxy package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
